item.title: Dita: Scaling Diffusion Transformer for Generalist Vision-Language-Action Policy
item.description: Dita: Scales a diffusion transformer for generalist robot policies, enabling 10-shot learning in complex, real-world tasks.

item.title: Redundancy Principles for MLLMs Benchmarks
item.description: This research proposes principles and a framework to tackle redundancy in MLLM benchmarks, enhancing efficiency and guiding future development.
